cu.explanation_en: Setting the S1U port to 99999 exceeds the valid port range, causing GTP-U tunnel failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting number of uplink slots to 20 exceeds the valid range for the periodicity, causing TDD configuration failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行時隙數設定為 20 超過週期有效範圍，會導致 TDD 配置失敗。
